    • addMeasurement

      public boolean addMeasurement​(com.estg.core.Measurement msrmnt) throws com.estg.core.exceptions.MeasurementException
      Adds a new measurement to the container
      Specified by:
      addMeasurement in interface com.estg.core.Container
      Parameters:
      msrmnt - measurement to be added to the container
      Returns:
      true if the measurement was inserted in the collection storing all measurements and false if the measurement already exists for a given date
      Throws:
      com.estg.core.exceptions.MeasurementException - if the measurement is null, if the value is lesser than 0, if the date is before the existing last measurement date, if the for a given date the measurement already exists but the values are different

    • getLastMeasuremnt

      public com.estg.core.Measurement getLastMeasuremnt() throws com.estg.core.exceptions.MeasurementException
      Getter for the last container measurement
      Returns:
      the last measurement
      Throws:
      com.estg.core.exceptions.MeasurementException - if the container dont have measurements
